dpm.lejos.turpis_lobortis

Class Localizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • dpm.lejos.turpis_lobortis.Localizer

  • public class Localizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Localizes robot at beginning of run based on sensor readings

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Localizer(Robot robot, OdometerTurpis odometerTurpis, Navigation nav)
      Localizer constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isLine(int side)
      Returns whether a line is under the selected color sensor is above a a black line
      int isStraightOnLine()
      Returns whether a color sensor is straight on a line or not Return CodeDescription -1Not on a line 0Left color sensor on a line 1Right color sensor on a line/TD>
      void localize()
      Localizes using ultrasonic sensor followed by downward facing color sensors
      void localizeLightly()
      Localizes using downward facing color sensors and corrects odometer
      void localizeSonicly()
      Localizes using falling edge method with outermost ultrasonic sensor and corrects odometer
      void relocalize()
      Relocalizes using downward facing color sensors

        • Method Detail

          • localize

            public void localize()
            Localizes using ultrasonic sensor followed by downward facing color sensors

          • isStraightOnLine

            public int isStraightOnLine()
            Returns whether a color sensor is straight on a line or not
            Return CodeDescription
            -1Not on a line
            0Left color sensor on a line
            1Right color sensor on a line/TD>
            Returns:
            the return code

          • localizeLightly

            Localizes using downward facing color sensors and corrects odometer

          • isLine

            public boolean isLine(int side)
            Returns whether a line is under the selected color sensor is above a a black line
            Parameters:
            side - select color sensor, 1 for RIGHT and 0 for LEFT
            Returns:
            true if line detected; false otherwise
